thread.title: After Tilt Toward Russia, U.N. Disagreement is Sharp
thread.title_full: After U.S. Tilt Toward Russia, U.N. Disagreement is Sharp - WSJ

author: Farnaz Fassihi
title: After Tilt Toward Russia, U.N. Disagreement is Sharp

organizations.name: u.n. disagreement is sharp united nations

text:
United Nations—Security Council diplomats grappling with questions about Europe’s peace and security were divided Tuesday on a key issue: the role of Russia.

Western diplomats called Russia the biggest destabilizing force in Europe because of its incursion into Ukraine while some Central European countries contended the only solution for Europe’s concerns involved closer ties between U.S. and Russia. U.S. Ambassador Nikki Haley took...
